casebody.data:
John Comerford, Individually, and as Administrator of the Estate of John Comerford, Deceased, v. Greater New York Councils

Boy Scouts of America.— Motion to dismiss appeal granted, with $10 costs, unless the appellant procures the appellant’s points to be served and filed on or before December 8, 1959, with notice of argument for the January 1960 Term of this court, said appeal to be argued or submitted when reached. Concur — Breitel, J. P., M. M. Frank, Yalente, McNally and Stevens, JJ.
